text: The Sandlot 2 (also known as The Sandlot 2: The Sandlot Continues and The Sandlot Kids 2 in some territories) is a 2005 American sports comedy movie directed and narrated by David Mickey Evans. It is the second movie in The Sandlot franchise and a direct-to-DVD sequel to The Sandlot (1993). The movie followed by another sequel The Sandlot: Heading Home (2007). Category:2005 comedy movies Category:2000s sports comedy movies Category:American sports comedy movies Category:Baseball movies Category:American sequel movies
title: The Sandlot 2
